data.actual_result: The button is clickable, and when clicked the app will constantly try to connect to the VC. You will see a box below the chat textfield saying "Disconnected" with a loading spinner. This box cannot be removed until app is restarted
data.expected_result: The button shouldn't be clickable in the first place
data.short_description: Long pressing a full voice channel in the channel drawer will allow you to attempt to join it, and doing so will cause a stuck loading bar to appear below the chatbox
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a full voice channel - Open channel drawer - Long press the voice channel - Tap Connect
